headline.main: CHURCHES SPARED IN SICILIAN TOWN; Palermo's Cathedral Not Hit by Allied Bombs -- Many Natives See Miracle

lead_paragraph: WITH THE UNITED STATES AIR FORCES, in Sicily, July 25 (Delayed) -- Municipal governments in Sicily are in good shape, but in many of the towns there is no water. The people report that the Germans blew up the reservoirs before they retreated.
abstract: Palermo chs escape bomb damage; Allies jail Fascist officials in towns they occupy; townspeople ask US troops for news of relatives in US
snippet: WITH THE UNITED STATES AIR FORCES, in Sicily, July 25 (Delayed) -- Municipal governments in Sicily are in good shape, but in many of the towns there is no water. The people report that the Germans blew up the reservoirs before they retreated....
